name: @adeze/raindrop-mcp
description: MCP Server for Raindrop.io with streaming/chunked tool results support

streaming.description: Supports streaming/chunked results for large datasets and long-running operations

stdio.description: Uses MCP progress notifications for STDIO transport

http.description: Uses SSE and chunked responses for HTTP transport

bookmark_search.description: Supports chunked search results with progress tracking

highlight_list.description: Supports chunked highlight retrieval with progress tracking

bookmark_batch_operations.description: Supports progress notifications for batch operations

export_bookmarks.description: Supports progress monitoring for export operations

export_status.description: Supports continuous progress tracking for export status
